https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pFtrb0WhEY2T9qAE5nk7WHql04f.jpg The story of a boy who lives in the port area of Rio de Janeiro in the 1920s and witnesses the emergence of Choro, when he meets the great pioneers of this purely carioca style. Alma Carioca - Um Choro de Menino
